block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Convert NetSuite Internal ID to VersaPay Identifier

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Convert NS Internal ID to VersaPay Identifier

flow_id.name: Callable - Convert NetSuite Internal ID to VersaPay Identifier

properties.label: Type
properties.name: type
pick_list: Credit Memo Application (to reduce Invoice balance)
Credit Memo Payment (to reduce Credit Memo balance)

block.comment: This will exclude items of type "Journal"

Create a list of all the invoices and payment amounts included in this payment.Â  We will use this list to create the VersaPay payment and update the Invoices (to ensure that VersaPay has the right balances).

input.name: 5cfb7745-0d89-4b19-88df-c77979127ae0:2037e9d9
input.value: [payment not inserted - no invoices in payment]

block.comment: If the payment does not include any invoices, then stop processing the payment (we don't need to send journal payments to VersaPay)

block.name: create_document
block.description: Create message using VersaPay - Email - Could not send payment from NetSuite to VersaPay template

input.subject: VersaPay Warning - Could not send Customer Payment #{_('data.foreach.40547b7c.tranId')} from NetSuite to VersaPay

input.name: 5cfb7745-0d89-4b19-88df-c77979127ae0:2037e9d9
input.value: [payment not inserted - different payors in payment]

block.comment: Loop through all the items in the apply list and make sure the same Customer or Partner is listed as the payor for the payment.Â  If there is a discrepancy, send an email to the AR team.
Logic for setting the VersaPay Payment Code

block.name: call_service_async
block.description: Call recipe Upsert NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay Invoice (do not wait for response)

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Upsert NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay Invoice

flow_id.name: Callable - Upsert NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay Invoice

properties.label: Ignore NetSuite Payment Internal ID
properties.name: ignore_ns_payment_internal_id
properties.hint: Ignore this payment if creating payments for a new invoice (to prevent infinite loops of a payment creating an invoice which recreates the payment...)

properties.label: Ignore NetSuite Credit Memo Internal ID
properties.name: ignore_ns_credit_memo_internal_id
properties.hint: Ignore this credit memo if creating payments for a new invoice (to prevent infinite loops of a credit memo creating an invoice which recreates the credit memo...)

block.comment: This can be asynchronous because a payment can be entered before the invoice and VersaPay will still link the two together once they are both present.

Add/Update each invoice that this payment was applied to.Â  This will ensure VersaPay has the correct balance information (since VersaPay recalculates the balance after each payment is applied, we send the balance information over to make sure any journals are reflected).Â  We have to send the entire Invoice object because the extended attributes are cleared out if they are not included in the update.

extended_input_schema.name: code
extended_input_schema.label: Error code
extended_input_schema.hint: Use this field to set custom HTTP error code for service replies. E.g: 404/422 etc. This field is applicable to REST service recipes.

extended_input_schema.name: custom_error_response
extended_input_schema.label: Custom error response?
extended_input_schema.hint: By default, Workato sends 'reply_type' and 'message' fields in response. When set to 'Yes', the content of the 'Message' field is sent as response body. This field is applicable to REST service recipes.

toggle_field.label: Custom error response?
toggle_field.hint: By default, Workato sends 'reply_type' and 'message' fields in response. When set to 'Yes', the content of the 'Message' field is sent as response body. This field is applicable to REST service recipes.
toggle_field.name: custom_error_response
